Your DuckDuckGo subscription expired
Need help with your subscription?
Get answers to frequently asked questions or contact subscription support from our help pages. Feature availability varies by country.
Add your subscription to this device
Link an email address to your subscription to add it to this device.
Add Your Subscription to Other Devices
Add your subscription to your other devices via Google Play or by linking an email address.
Use the email above to add your subscription on your other devices in the DuckDuckGo app. Go to Settings > Subscription Settings > I Have a Subscription.
